comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content:
The date is visible along the upper right side: 8/4/13  reversed (August 4th, 1913)

The words "Jones & Laughlin" appear in raised letters on almost every vertical I-beam, indicating the source as Jones and Laughlin Steel Company, Pittsburgh, PA.

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: D'oh! Thanks for the correction, Wystan!

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: technogeo:  Thanks.  We'll add the date to the record next time we update.
